character_style_instruction: Create a photorealistic, high-detail, full-color character reference portrait. Neutral studio lighting, clean background, sharp focus, natural skin texture, realistic fabric texture, subtle depth of field. This image is the baseline reference for all other images of this character (mugshot and interrogation room). Maintain consistent facial features, hair, age, and overall look across all images.
name: Eleanor Vance
character_prompt: Character reference portrait of Eleanor Vance, elderly wealthy matriarch, haughty but composed expression, silver hair in a tight bun, sharp black blazer and pearls, realistic skin texture and subtle wrinkles, neutral studio background, photorealistic 8k.
